verbs.description: [ARG0: Chicago Tribune columnist Kristen McQueary] [V: argues] [ARG1: that the policy under President Donald Trump of separating kids from their parents is not a conservative one] .
Chicago Tribune columnist Kristen McQueary argues that [ARG1: the policy under President Donald Trump of separating kids from their parents] [V: is] [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARG2: a conservative one] .
